website_summaries.verdict: The grand dame of chandelier ceiling fans with the modern touches today's homes need.
pros: The bronze finish looks beautiful during the day and night
cons: Not as large as it looks

customer_reviews.title: Words can’t describe!
customer_reviews.text: First one came damaged but they shipped a replacement the day I called. Second one is gorgeous!!! It’s very quiet and I can feel the air from across the room. Very glad I purchased this one!
customer_reviews.author: Kimmysgone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a five because it’s stunning, but the instructions suck
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Bowden

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 2 1 broken at welds. Had both re-welded myself.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these fans. 1 arrived broken at welds. The other had missing screws. Had both welded myself, and another bar of metal added in order to hang and ensure that they would not fall. After this they are beautiful installed. Amazon was courteous and helpful when I informed them of the issues I had with these fans. Gave a 3 star because of extra time and money spent to get these installed properly. Look is beautiful and 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Jodene

customer_reviews.title: I wanted a chandelier in my master bedroom but was unwilling to give up my ceiling fan and this is the perfect solution! The directions are just plain awful though
customer_reviews.text: This ceiling fan is gorgeous! I wanted a chandelier in my master bedroom but was unwilling to give up my ceiling fan and this is the perfect solution! The directions are just plain awful though, so be patient. And some of the parts are shoddy and broke coming out of the box and we had to do some repair but it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value and just WOW!
customer_reviews.text: This fixture is stunningly beautiful. You’ll need a high ceiling, it’s big. Ours is mounted at 10’. Crystals are glass and they are assembled to the frame right out of the box. It was installed by electrician so I can’t speak to ease of installation. I love it. It’s a showpiece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Elegant, Gorgeous.m, GREAT Price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this ceiling fan! It’s very elegant and an excellent price! Saw one on a few other websites for almost $100 more! It is very elegant and will make any living room/bedroom very classy.
customer_reviews.author: GundamAsh

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control not so good....
customer_reviews.text: Received fan and a section of the beads are missing while the section next to it isn’t fully attached. Submitted issue to vendor will update with solutions
customer_reviews.author: mablest

customer_reviews.title: Items r shipped broken or returned prior and resent broken
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware item is either broken or breaks easily and will not let u return item..understand policy but sometimes u need to find a electrician and 30 days is not long enough. In this case a welder and an electrician. This makes Amazon look bad!
customer_reviews.author: Cyndie Teofrio

customer_reviews.title: one of a kind
customer_reviews.text: this is literally a work of art, I had it professionally installed and I would advise as such if you are of basic skill set. This is a heavy unit have six bulbs I use led bulbs where you can see the filaments and this gives and exceptional effect. I also found out that to get the crystals to stand out you have to use daylight bulbs and they literally pop and sparkle like diamonds. This is a well worth the cost arrived well packaged and secured.
customer_reviews.author: BURNS B

customer_reviews.title: Wowzas!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so beautiful!! It arrived in perfect condition but was a little difficult to install. Still, after adding the light bulbs and putting it up, it hangs beautifully and lets off a gorgeous lighting against the walls. It really becomes the focal point of the room and it’s awesome that you still get the fan functionality. The only thing I didn’t like was that it took a while to anchor and balance the fan so it wouldn’t wobble. It’s kind of a guessing game with how they designed it. Either way, I still highly recommend this to everyone!!
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: After it was installed it didn’t work, very upset, waste of money!! Don’t buy this product
customer_reviews.author: Homero

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely stunning. Great centerpiece.
customer_reviews.text: You probably need high ceilings to pull it off. I have 10 ft. Instructions are somewhat useless, there are several parts not mentioned in them or even shown in the components list. There is a small cone shaped peice that gets a rubber gromet and slides up to cover the screws in the canopy, some people have missed it. It takes 3 candelabra bulbs and 1 standard.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous & sparkly
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fixture. A tad bigger than anticipated, but worked in the room because it sits over a bed/table. A tall person would get "caught" up in the fan for sure if it was mounted on a lower ceiling. My recommendation is that it fits best in a room with higher ceiling due to the length of the fixture. Highly recommend this beautiful light!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: loveeee it
customer_reviews.text: its gorgeous and the fan blows perfectly wow it amazing
customer_reviews.author: lashay

customer_reviews.title: This is a gorgeous piece of elegance!
customer_reviews.text: I received this fan in tact had it installed and I am over the moon for this fan!
customer_reviews.author: wingirl747

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Combination for the Undecided!
customer_reviews.text: If you're unsure whether or not you want a ceiling fan or chandelier, this is for you! I bought it for my newly constructed Master Bedrm because I couldn't make a decision on a ceiling fan or chandelier. I love it! I've received so many compliments! Looks just as pictured! Perfect combination! Try it!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Cayman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: So this is a beautiful ceiling fan and it looks fabulous in my living room; however, this fan has some flaws. The ring that supposed to keep the blade in place keeps slipping when it runs on high, which then makes the fan makes a loud knocking horrible noise.
customer_reviews.author: JEB

customer_reviews.title: Okay product. a bit shaky
customer_reviews.text: It's better in the picture that real life. It is lighter that I was expecting. At high speed it shakes. Looks good in the ceiling. It's not worth $1300 as it claims
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice, but quality issues.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely some build quality issues. I had to bend parts so the fan could spin and not have the top glass bowl sitting on top of the blades. BUT, once modified, it’s sharp looking and compliments the room. I know some people will think 3 stars rating is too generous with quality in question, but it looks that good.
customer_reviews.author: Sound traveller

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful. Installed to our upper loft where the fan ...
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful. Installed to our upper loft where the fan can be seen as people enter the house and look up into the loft.
customer_reviews.author: DaveM

customer_reviews.title: I purchased three of these magnificent fans Two were damaged ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three of these magnificent fans Two were damaged in transit 😞 but the intact one is gracing my tray ceiling It is stunning Absolutely gorgeous Honestly the picture does not to it justice Well worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Karen R.

customer_reviews.title: Warehouse of Tiffany CFL-8154BR Charla 4-Light Crystal 52-inch Chandelier Ceiling Fan, Red
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our formal living room. Beautiful light fixture and fan! Insure your light box is installed into a stud for this is a pretty heavy fixture.
customer_reviews.author: Geri

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made will not purchase from this group again
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made. Would require a welder to fix it. While the crystals and the design are beautiful, there's no way to put a fan on this light. I had to return it, very sad
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: You will love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Statement piece! Wish they had it without the fan ad we would have bought two! Great price!
customer_reviews.author: sheri

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged.
customer_reviews.text: I just found someone go hang this beautiful ceiling fan for me and one of the crystal parts was broken and the whole rod was bent. Defective!
customer_reviews.author: G.

customer_reviews.title: A Fan with Glam
customer_reviews.text: What a value and beautiful. My original light in my bedroom did not provide a lot of lighting. This one is a vast improvement and beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Retail Therapy Works

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty... useful but struggles with air flow in VERY large rooms with high ceilings. its gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Gunter

customer_reviews.title: poor instructions. Perfect lamp /fan for a small room
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to install ; cable loose ; poor instructions . Perfect lamp /fan for a small room .
customer_reviews.author: XXX

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: Very elegant. Love how they look in my living room and adjacent music room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Directions are terrible!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of the fan and lights, truly elegant! Unfortunately, you must be somewhat experienced at ceiling fan installation to even get put up. Terrible Directions!
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product very very beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Its a beautiful fan the only issue I have is that it hangs very low huge fan so make sure u have high ceilings

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful once it’s installed
customer_reviews.text: The instructions could have been better, but overall this is beautiful and worth the money, so far.
customer_reviews.author: APRIL MOORE

customer_reviews.title: Love. This product  my Tiffany fan chandelier
customer_reviews.text: I as soon as I purchase this beautiful chandelier it automatically went on sale. I purchased it at $269 in a split second it was reduced to -$230 so amazon please refund to my account the different of this product. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Joyce A.Smith

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Stunning! Poor directions but with a little common sense you can get it

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I got this installed and loved it!! Everybody that sees this is in love w/ it!! So beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa doggie mom

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very stunning light! Pictures simply do not do it justice!
customer_reviews.author: Tim and Johnnie Watson

customer_reviews.title: Came broke in two places!
customer_reviews.text: I love the design since it’s really elegant but it came broken in two places. You can see in the picture where. For such an expensive fan, it’s not very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Honest

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Beautiful. It has just been installed in my new ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Beautiful. It has just been installed in my new construction.
customer_reviews.author: Mavis Troy

customer_reviews.title: 4/5 rating
customer_reviews.text: Received an open box item that was never mentioned and return shipping label still in the box. But luckily all parts were there and install went out fine.
customer_reviews.author: Shaan

customer_reviews.title: It’s Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fan ! It is in our family room. I wanted a chandelier and husband wanted a fan! I added gold leaf antique paint .My husband put it up. The only thing I didn’t like is the return policy. I took a chance and I’m glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this product - its pure beauty in our master ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this product - its pure beauty in our master bedroom. Priced at a great deal, fairly easy install. Highly recommend before it sells out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful! I had to put it in the den because the den has a high ceiling. It is big, so the ceiling has to be extra high. I get compliments on it by everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca Johnston

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful fan and really made my living room look elegant. Love it.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: The directions were horrible but a gorgeous light. We love it!!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its very beautiful in my family room and I got many complements.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I really love it! I am very satisfied with this product

customer_reviews.text: The light is absolutely beautiful but the piece that rotates the fan came broken and no instructions.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Fan
customer_reviews.text: Stunning in person. Perfect combination of a fan and chandelier!

product_meta.title: Warehouse of Tiffany CFL-8154BR Charla 4-Light Crystal 52-inch Chandelier Ceiling Fan, Red
product_meta.description:
Description:

Give your home the glamour and artistic allure you deserve with this chandelier ceiling fan. The combination of antique bronze, high quality clear crystals, and stained real wood blades delivers a sophisticated and elegant addition to any space. Our dependable and quiet fan motor used in all our high quality ceiling fans offer three speed settings to keep you perfectly cooled. This is a very attractive piece best suited for taller ceilings.


Features:

 * Chandelier ceiling fan
 * Five (5) wood fan blades
 * Crystal accents
 * Antique bronze finish
 * Three (3) fan speeds
 * Bowl style light
 * Indoor use only
 * Four (4) lights
 * Requires 3 E12 60-watt bulbs and 1 E26 60-watt bulb (not included)
 * Line switch
 * CSA, ETL, and UL listed
 * Can be used with a dimmer


Dimensions:

 * Dimensions (overall): 52 in diameter x 25 in high
 * Lower Shade: 10 in diameter x 7 in high
 * Downrod: 10 in
 * Motor Housing: 18 in diameter x 10 in high
 * Size of Blade: 20 in long x 5 in wide


Motor Speeds:

 * 180 RPM at 4800 CFM (Level 1)
 * 140 RPM at 3500 CFM (Level 2)
 * 100 RPM at 2600 CFM (Level 3)


Assembly Required 

Professional Installation is Highly Recommended
feature_bullets: Dimensions: 52 inches diameter x 25 inches high
Requires Three (3) E12 @ 60-watt bulbs; One (1) E26 @ 60-watt bulb (NONE INCLUDED)
Product Features: Blades Included, CSA Listed, UL Listed
Assembly required. This fixture does need to be hard wired. Professional installation is recommended.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars102 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
